item.description:
Santa Claus is one of the most prevalent FANTASYs in American culture. Why not celebrate this holiday myth by drinking!

Join me and hundreds of Santas on Saturday as we take over Boston.

No Santa suit? No problem. Santa needs elves, reindeer, and hipsters wearing ugly Xmas sweaters to help carry all of the toys.

More details here: https://www.facebook.com/events/132950470188737/

Meet inside Bleacher Bar from 12-1:30pm, look for me, the only Santa Saurus Rex. Santa Chewy may or may not be there. I met him at Santacon.

I will give my cell number out to attendees so you can find the group, even if you come late.

Each guest will get a present from Santa Saurus!

Â
item.name: Boston Santacon Bar Crawl
